feature_description: Urban audit identifier of city. Coding: CC###C where CC = country code, ### = 3-digit sequential number, C = city. More information at https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/statistics-explained/index.php?title=City_statistics_-_a_shared_city_definition#SE_MAIN_TT
processing_method: None

feature_description: Urban audit name of city. The slash �/� can be used to separate multiple language versions of the same city name. More information at https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/statistics-explained/index.php?title=City_statistics_-_a_shared_city_definition#SE_MAIN_TT
processing_method: None

feature_description: Extent of city in square meters as reported in Urban Audit 2021
processing_method: None

feature_description: Extent of city in hectares
processing_method: Convert area_sqm to hectares

feature_description: Longitude in WGS84 of the boundary center
processing_method: Get coordinates of centroid of boundary polygon

feature_description: Latitude in WGS84 of the boundary center
processing_method: Get coordinates of centroid of boundary polygon

feature_description: Horizontal coordinate in EPSG:3035 of the boundary center
processing_method: Get coordinates of centroid of boundary polygon

feature_description: Vertical coordinate in EPSG:3035 of the boundary center
processing_method: Get coordinates of centroid of boundary polygon

feature_description: City boundary in WGS84 coordinates
processing_method: None

feature_description: Minimum elevation of city in meters above sea level
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip Copernicus DEM GLO-30 to the city boundary; get minimum value (excluding nodata)

feature_description: Maximum elevation of city in meters above sea level
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip Copernicus DEM GLO-30 to the city boundary; get maximum value (excluding nodata)

feature_description: Standard deviation of elevation of city in meters above sea level
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip Copernicus DEM GLO-30 to the city boundary; get average value (excluding nodata)

feature_description: Mean elevation of city in meters above sea level
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip Copernicus DEM GLO-30 to the city boundary; get standard deviation (excluding nodata)

feature_description: Environmental zone spanning the city boundary. If a city crosses several environmental zones, the one with maximum intersection is used.
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, get the environmental zone class that appears within the city boundary with highest frequency
remarks: list of codes and names in environmental_zones_codelist.csv

feature_description: Share of sealed area within the city boundary
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip CLMS Tree cover density 100m layer to city boundary. Get the density value (expressed in %). Compute (Sum of tree covered area)[ha]/city_area_ha[ha]. Sum of tree covered area is computed as sum(%value*cell area) where cell area is 1ha.

feature_description: Share of area covered by trees withing the city boundary
processing_method: Using SentinelHub Python API, clip CLMS Imperviousness density 100m layer to city boundary. Get the density value (expressed in %). Compute (Sum of sealed area)[ha]/city_area_ha[ha]. Sum of sealed area is computed as sum(%value*cell area) where cell area is 1ha.

feature_name: Urban Atlas class 11100 Continuous Urban Fabric (S.L. > 80%)
feature_description: Total area of Urban Atlas class 11100 (Continuous Urban Fabric (S.L. > 80%)) within the city boundary
processing_method: CLMS Urban Atlas 2018 vector product is rasterized to 10m resolution (CRS EPSG:3035). The total area in class 11100 is computed by summing all cells in that class.

feature_name: Urban Atlas class 11210 Discontinuous Dense Urban Fabric (S.L. : 50% -  80%)
feature_description: Total area of Urban Atlas class 11210 (Discontinuous Dense Urban Fabric (S.L. : 50% -  80%)) within the city boundary
processing_method: CLMS Urban Atlas 2018 vector product is rasterized to 10m resolution (CRS EPSG:3035). The total area in class 11210 is computed by summing all cells in that class.

feature_description: Share of Urban Atlas green classes (UA classes 11230; 11240; 14*00; 2*000; 3*000; 40000) within the city boundary
processing_method: (ua_class_11230 + ua_class_11240 + ua_class_14100 + ua_class_14200 + ua_class_ 21000 + ua_class_ 22000 + ua_class_ 23000 + ua_class_ 24000 + ua_class_ 25000 + ua_class_ 31000 + ua_class_ 32000 + ua_class_ 33000 + ua_class_40000)/area_ha

feature_description: share of urban blue area (UA class 50000)
processing_method: ua_class_50000/area_ha

feature_description: hourly 2m temperature averaged in city over one year, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
Count of summer days (>25 degrees) per year per city, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
Count of tropical nights (min. temperature >20 degrees) per year per city, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
number of UTCI (Universal Thermal Climate Index)  nights by UTCI classes
processing_method: The night hours were first extracted from the hourly values: from locally 18h to locally 6h. In the next step, the UTCI temps were calculated within the NIGHT and transferred to UTCI classes. The number of days (nights) for each class was then calculated for each year.

feature_description: Whether the city has a coastline or not
processing_method: True if the intersection of city boundary and EU coastline is non-empty.
